game.name: Bots City
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Artificial intelligence is out of control. Only a Hero can stop this madness. The Hero's goal is to get to the main computer and disable it, thereby disabling all robots. Our hero has only one weapon, but that won't stop him!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Artificial intelligence is out of control. Only a Hero can stop this madness. The Hero's goal is to get to the main computer and disable it, thereby disabling all robots. Our hero has only one weapon, but that won't stop him!

reviewHighlights.text: 51000원 값어치를 하는 이 시대의 진정한 게임입니다. 괜히 긍정적 평가를 받은게 아니군요
